course_description: All first-year students enroll in a one-credit hour course called ECS 101: The Emory Edge in their first semester.  The course provides an introduction to the liberal arts at Emory, university policies, campus resources and opportunities.  During class sessions and out of class experiences, students are asked to reflect, explore and create 4-year plans.
sections: Class Nbr: 2974, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Obrentz/Morran, Status: Open
